familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner received $15,001 - $50,000 in Rent or Royalties income from WESTMINSTER LINDEN, LLC (Residential Real Estate in Brooklyn, NY) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: WESTMINSTER LINDEN, LLC (Residential Real Estate in Brooklyn, NY)
